definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Note: the heat shock consensus sequences are indicated by underscores.
sentences.chinese: 下划线表示热激保守序列。

sentences.english: Note that, here, the lifeline name is underlined.
sentences.chinese: 这里注意一点，生命线名称带下划线。

sentences.english: Hover the mouse over a section underlined in red.
sentences.chinese: 将鼠标停在红色下划线部分上。

sentences.english: By default, the separator is an underscore character.
sentences.chinese: 在默认情况下，分隔符是下划线字符。

sentences.english: Note the underlining of the validity error.
sentences.chinese: 注意打了下划线的有效性错误。

sentences.english: Would you change the boldface terms, perhaps using italic or underlining?
sentences.chinese: 你会改变黑体字方面，可能使用斜体或下划线？

sentences.english: Keep the red color, but get rid of the underlining and hover state.
sentences.chinese: 保持红色不变，但去除下划线和悬浮状态。

sentences.english: The user points out that php adds a '_' to your prefixes.
sentences.chinese: 前缀和数组键名之间会自动加上一个下划线。

sentences.english: Hover the mouse over a section underlined in blue.
sentences.chinese: 将鼠标停在蓝色下划线部分上。

sentences.english: The underline is a hint that the named file exists.
sentences.chinese: 下划线表示指定的文件存在。

sentences.english: Underline, bold face, and use bullets to emphasize your credentials.
sentences.chinese: 下划线，加粗，并使用重点突出强调你的荣誉。

sentences.english: The underscores were the sites for restriction digest.
sentences.chinese: 下划线是限制性酶切位点。

sentences.english: You can separate words within the probe name using a double underscore.
sentences.chinese: 可以用双下划线分隔探测名中的单词。

sentences.english: A file name component is the portion of a file name between backslashes.
sentences.chinese: 文件名组成部分即下划线之间的文件名。

sentences.english: What do Horvath's underlined words in Para 10 imply?
sentences.chinese: 第十段中，下划线的霍瓦特所说的话意味着什么？

sentences.english: All other characters in an identifier must be letters, digits, or the underscore.
sentences.chinese: 标识符的其他字符必须是字母，数字或下划线。

definition: blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
Chinese underdot (punct. used for emphasis, sim. to Western italics)
